body:
Thanks for reporting this critical issue.

I will send out a PR to fix this soon.

issue.title: Fix NPE when set ScaleType in xml.

repository.name: lottie-android

body:
Hi,
I have the same issue. Work perfectly in 2.8.0

issue.title: Bug: crash of "InflateException" when using Lottie 3.2.0

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
Crash.

**What version of Lottie did you test this on?**
3.2.0

**What version of Android did you test this on?**
Android 10 (Q). on Pixel 2.

**Steps To Reproduce**
Just have a simple animation view of Lottie, and run the app.
The issue doesn't exist on 3.1.0.

The bug is that it crashes with this log:
```
Caused by: android.view.InflateException: Binary XML file line #7 in com.example.user.lottietest:layout/activity_main: Error inflating class com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView
```
[2019-11-17_12-29-47.zip](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/files/3855472/2019-11-17_12-29-47.zip)
[LottieTest.zip](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/files/3855473/LottieTest.zip)

body:
Just a note:
This occurs on centerCrop scaleType too, as I wrote here (with sample) : 
https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/1435

This also occurred for me with `centerInside` as the `scaleType`.

```xml
<com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView
    android:id="@+id/lav_animation"
    android:layout_width="0dp"
    android:layout_height="0dp"
    android:layout_margin="32dp"
    android:scaleType="centerInside"
    app:layout_constraintDimensionRatio="1:1"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
    app:lottie_autoPlay="false"
    app:lottie_loop="true"
    app:lottie_rawRes="@raw/lottie_reservation_1" />
```

issue.title: Add unit test for XML initialized Lottie view.

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
To prevent issue like https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/issues/1432 from happening again, add a unit test to verify the Lottie view initialization process via XML.

One nit of this PR is the XML test file is included in aar. If there's better option to exclude it from release package, please advise.

body:
Why is this closed?
Is it fixed? What should I put on gradle as dependency?
3.3.0  ?

Because it is fixed.

Version 3.2.2 and newer work. I am using 3.2.2 in production currentlythat one definitely resolves the issue.

@PattaFeuFeu OK thank you.
Too bad nobody wrote on which version it's fixed when it got closed
